attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the British public, have a right to know the FULL UNEDITED facts regarding the HMRC fiasco of losing 25 million individuals data.

Serious questions need to be asked as to:
1) How did a 'junior official' have access to this kind of information?
2) Why was this person given the task of sending this information?
3) Why, if the NAO didn't need any personal information, did the HMRC send this level of detail?
4) What level of pay-off did Sir Paul Gray receive as part of his resignation?
5) Will criminal charges be brought against the 'junior official', his senior, right up to and including Sir Paul Gray himself?

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
